description:
Over 2,000,000 people trust Private Camera. The Best Private Photo app! 

Did you worried about that a friend borrows your iPhone or iPad saw your private photos? 

Did you worried about that your iPhone or iPad was lost cause your family party videos leaked? 

Did you worry about that your parents saw your new beautiful girlfriend? 

Now, that was not a problem anymore! "Private Camera" experience to protecting your photos and videos. 

With Password-lock functionality, can protect your personal photos and videos. Its unique Pseudo-password(decoy-password) guest mode, can cope with annoying friends from seeing your private photos and videos. With easy to use camera features, let you using iPhone or iPad take photos & videos and enjoy your photography life! 

Private Camera is an iPhone and iPad camera app that could protect your privacy. 

It supports taking photos and recording videos, password lock protect, Fake password guest mode, share photos anytime and anywhere. 

[Take photo and video] 
Take photos and videos quick and easily. Support autofocus, tap to focus, flash light switch, camera switch, brand new UI, easy to use. Support taking still photo and recording video. Switch the video and photo mode one click. 

[Album]
Create, rename, delete album, set album cover. Add photos to Album, remove photos from Album. And fully iCloud support.

[Multiple photos operation]
Multiple photos can be handled at a time, you can import photos from system camera roll, export photos to system camera roll, add photos to album, remove photos from album, delete multiple photos.

[Wi-Fi transfer]
Wi-Fi web access for photos upload, you can upload many photos from computer to iPhone or iPad in one shot. 

[iCloud enabled] 
Private Camera can sync all your photos and videos on your iCloud account, you can access these photos & videos on all your iOS devices, use and share these photos & videos anytime, everywhere. 

[Password Protect] 
Protect photos and videos that you don't want to share. User requires enter password when access the photos/videos library. 

[Share] 
Share photos and videos on Twitter, Facebook, Email with your friends.

==================================
Lite Version Restrictions
==================================
Lite version can store only limited photos or video.
If you like our apps, please buy Private Camera Pro version, Thank you!

----------------------------------------------------------
Like us on Facebook :  http://www.facebook.com/orcbit
Follow us on Twitter :  https://twitter.com/orcbit
trackCensoredName: Private Camera - Photo vault & manager, video photo safe app, lock hide secret photos and private folder with password

releaseNotes:
- Better photo browsing
- Hide App content when enter background
- Fix image filter orientation bug
- Fix other known issues
